title: The process test resource
description: A process test resource sets up a process and exposes its PID

exePath.default: /tmp/event-generator<X>, where X is a randomly generated sequence

args.description: A string containing the space-separated list of command line arguments. If a single argument contains spaces, the entire argument must be quoted in order to not be considered as multiple arguments

exe.description: The argument in position 0 (a.k.a. argv[0]) of the process
exe.default: The name if this is specified; otherwise, filepath.Base(exePath)

env.description: The set of environment variables that must be provided to the process (in addition to the default ones)

additionalProperties.description: An environment variable in the form KEY=VALUE
